entry.title: Simple Stress Test for REST API

link.title: Simple Stress Test for REST API

entry.summary: Why is it needed? As a part of my workflow, I had to repeatedly hit the same REST API end points to simulate load on the system. A shell script works better and is a leaner solution on most Unix systems. This is a simple script which allows you to do that with number of time stress test has to be done. The repetition is provided as an argument. Usage Matrix Spec Value ...
